definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: This position guarantees continuity as Beijing Playhouse goes from show to show.
sentences.chinese: 該職位保證北京中英百老匯各個演出間的連續性。

sentences.english: The show was an overnight success on Broadway .
sentences.chinese: 在百老匯的演出一炮打響。

sentences.english: Broadway was the weakest in salt resistance.
sentences.chinese: 三種草坪草種相比，百老匯的耐鹽性最差。

sentences.english: But next year on Broadway I hope to see a large improvement in that.
sentences.chinese: 不過明年到百老匯混的話，我一定要有長足的進步。

sentences.english: Maybe, though I doubt many actual ska rockers went to see “A Chorus Line.”
sentences.chinese: 我嚴重懷疑搖滾青年會去百老匯看錶演嗎？

sentences.english: She’d rather see whatever’s on Broadway or in the museums.
sentences.chinese: 她更喜歡看博物館的展覽或是百老匯的演出。
她的這齣戲在百老匯不受歡迎。

sentences.english: A thoroughfare of New York, the longest street in the world.
sentences.chinese: 百老匯大街美國紐約的一條大街，世界上最長的街道。

sentences.english: Cats is one of the most popular musicals on Broadway.
sentences.chinese: 《貓》是百老匯最受歡迎的音樂劇之一。

sentences.english: A fashion show at the merge of Broadway and Seventh Avenue showcased the newest trends in intimate apparel.
sentences.chinese: 在百老匯和第七大道的交叉口，一場內衣秀正在上演。

sentences.english: There are books galore, movies in the works, perhaps a Broadway play.
sentences.chinese: 豐富的書籍，電影作品，可能還有百老匯劇目。

sentences.english: Broadway and its plays and theaters, Connegie Hall for the best in the performing arts.
sentences.chinese: 百老匯的劇目，止耐基大廳最優秀的藝術表演。

sentences.english: Plug your ears and this could be Broadway.
sentences.chinese: 塞上耳朵吧，這就是百老匯的方式。

sentences.english: Wall Street, Liberty Street, Broadway, all empty.
sentences.chinese: 華爾街，自由街，百老匯，都是空的。

sentences.english: Shubert Alley, center of the theater on Broadway.
The play ran for two consecutive years in Broadway.
sentences.chinese: 這齣戲在百老匯連續上演了兩年。

definition: merry-go-round/carousel/Carousel, South Korean TV soap opera
to depart as quick as a flash/flash mob
Wan Chai district of Hong Kong
